tool_description: The CatImageRandomizer API is a fun and delightful service that provides users with a random cat image every time they make a request. If you're a cat lover, developer, or simply looking to add a touch of whimsy to your applications, this API is the perfect choice.
name: CatImageRandomizer API
title: CatImageRandomizer API

api_list.name: postCat
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://catimagerandomizer-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "catimagerandomizer-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
